name: Sewer 2077
description:
Sewer 2077 is a Short Procedurally generated Platformer game.

In a Different World far far away, Society is facing Overpopulation Issue. Technology has advanced but only wealthy people can enjoy the Luxury of Space Exploration. As a solution random people will be chosen and thrown into a complex sewer Structure.

Climb your way back up and regain your rights and freedom!

Features: 

- 5 ~ 30 Minutes of Gameplay
- Short Procedurally generated Stage
- 3 Characters with different Abilities & Personality

Controls :
Arrow keys - Move Characters
Z - Attack
X - Dash

If you have any Feedback then feel free to put in in the Comment. That'll help me develop my Skills. And thanks for playing or reading :D
